entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as having an expression on his face that suggests he has been upset or disturbed. He denies being upset but eventually reveals the truth about Snape's betrayal.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as moving away from the window and looking closely at Harry with a slight crease between his eyebrows. He asks Harry what has happened to him.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned by Harry as the one who betrayed him by telling Voldemort about the prophecy and listening outside the door when Trelawney told Harry.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned by Harry as the one to whom Snape betrayed Harry by revealing the prophecy.

entities.name: fawkes
entities.description: Fawkes is described as giving a soft squawk behind Dumbledore and Harry when Harry mentions Snape's name.

entities.name: trelawney
entities.description: Trelawney is mentioned by Harry as the one who told him about the prophecy that Snape betrayed to Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry accuses Snape of betraying him by telling Voldemort about the prophecy and listening outside the door when Trelawney told Harry.
Dumbledore is concerned for Harry's well-being and asks him what has happened to him.
